item.title: Abandoned blue Mercedes van., 9th December
item.description:

item.title: 2 large sofas on a main pathway, 9th December
item.description:
Someone has left 2 sofas on the path along the main road. Unsure if it's someone that is a resident of the flats at 46 Combedale or someone else in the surrounding area as people that aren't residents of the flat seem to always use these bins aswell

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Combedale Road, Greenwich

item.title: Blocked drain, 9th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Acacia Way, Blackfen, Greater London

item.title: The give away sign has faded, 9th December
item.description:
The giveaway sign painted on the floor connecting Briant street to Lubbock Street has faded. This is a course for concern as it can cause accidents due to drivers being unable to understand who has right of way at the junction
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Briant Street, New Cross Gate, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beechcroft Avenue, Barnehurst, Greater London

item.title: Corner of kylemore road, 9th December
item.description:
Light for no left turn is broken. Drivers are turning left accidentally at night. Please repair light asap. Makes the area very dark too as street light on sherriff road opposite sherriff court is also broken
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, Sherriff Road, Kilburn, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
